sect2.title: Creating Network Interface Configuration Files
sect2.para: The following command creates a sample ipv4 file for the eth0 device:

screen.userinput: cd /etc/sysconfig/network-devices && mkdir ifconfig.eth0 && cat > ifconfig.eth0/ipv4 << "EOF" ONBOOT=yes SERVICE=ipv4-static IP=192.168.1.1 GATEWAY=192.168.1.2 PREFIX=24 BROADCAST=192.168.1.255 EOF

sect2.title: Creating the /etc/resolv.conf File
sect2.para: Create the file by running the following:

screen.userinput:
cat > /etc/resolv.conf << "EOF" # Begin /etc/resolv.conf
domain {[Your Domain Name]} nameserver [IP address of your primary nameserver] nameserver [IP address of your secondary nameserver]
# End /etc/resolv.conf EOF
